message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $165. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'd like to stick with my original proposal of $150 for the product. This price aligns better with my budget and purchasing power.
I understand that you're firm on your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $157.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $155 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $158. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $156 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise and remains within my budget.
I'm starting to get close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll offer the product to you for $160. This is my final concession, and I think it's a fair price for the product.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to counter with a price of $157 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise and remains within my budget constraints.
